
## rgba2grayscale {.unnumbered}


### Description

Changes RGB image to grayscale



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>rgb2grayscale(img)
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="img">img</code></td>
<td>
A 3D array with slices R, G, and B
</td></tr>
</table>


### Value

img as a 3D array as grayscale
